content.question: A historian would most likely use the passage as evidence for which of the following in the nineteenth century?

choices.label: The level of womenâ€™s consumer spending

content.answer: The economic conditions of educated middle- and upper-class women

topic.text: 6.10: Causation in the Age of Industrialization
